name: differentiator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a quality or feature that makes something different from, and usually better than, other similar things: Technology is likely to remain a key differentiator as companies compete for customers. There are many companies that sell health insurance products — what would be the differentiator for you as a customer?
More examplesFewer examplesUnderstanding how to control risk is a key differentiator as to whether a business succeeds or fails.In this particular market, cost is a key differentiator.They needed a differentiator, a product which could elevate their brand and increase their market share.The strength of our community has been one of our strongest differentiators for more than a century.
